prawahana amathyanshaya magin palanaya karanu labana shri lankawe dumriya sewaya meratata handunwa denu labuwe 1858 di...pradhana marga pahak osse thama sewawan pawathwagena yanawa...warthamanaye shri lanka dumriya sewaya kilomitara 1508ka pululmargayakin( di 5 angal 6) samanwithaya...wisheshathama karanaya wanne lokaye thiyena lassanama dum riya margha atharata ape dum riya margayada ekathu wima....dumriya margaya diyaali, swabhawika wananthara sahitha kanduwati, midumen wasigath kandu mudun aadi swabhawika alankarayen menma minisage alankara nirmana wana the wathu, payin wananthara ha palam, us sthanawala pihiti dumriya sathana aadi injineruwarunge wishwakarma nirmana aadiyenda alankruthaya.
